response.overview: After a few years of marriage, a loving coupleâ€™s (Khloe Kapri, Jack Desfeux) love life has devolved into the mundane. Khloe grows weary of going through the motions and yearns to be unleashed. After another uninspiring, missionary position quickie, Khloe musters the courage to bring up the subject with her husband. To her surprise, Jack soon gets the message and initiates something different, which begins their transformation from a bored married couple to a sexually imaginative duo ready to try anything.
response.title: Let's Do Something Different
